channel.title: My run.bat isint working
channel.description:
well when i run my .bat file it will say
"system starting... enforcing client requirements, settings loaded sucsessfully! server is allready in use. handler finished loading"
and here is what is say's when i hit edit on it
"@echo off cd Bin java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.12-ga-bin.jar server exit" and i need to know if this is correct i do have java jdk 6.12 to let you know

item.title: My run.bat isint working
item.dc:creator: @ethanpk ethanpk
item.description:
@ethanpk wrote:

well when i run my .bat file it will say

“system starting…
enforcing client requirements,
settings loaded sucsessfully!
server is allready in use.
handler finished loading”

and here is what is say’s when i hit edit on it

“@echo off
cd Bin
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.12-ga-bin.jar server
exit” and i need to know if this is correct i do have java jdk 6.12 to let you know

Read full topic
